MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.Schema InputSchema { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property InputSchema As Schema
member this.InputSchema : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.Schema

Docs.summary: The input schema that this transform model was originally instantiated on. Note that the schema may have columns that aren't needed by this transform model. If an IDataView exists with this schema, then applying this transform model to it shouldn't fail because of column type issues.

Public ReadOnly Property OutputSchema As Schema
member this.OutputSchema : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.Schema

Docs.summary: The output schema that this transform model was originally instantiated on. The schema resulting from may differ from this, similarly to how may differ from the schema of dataviews we apply this transform model to.
